item.title: Containers
item.description: What is Containers Containers!!!! This terminology is booming around last few years from now. So before moving to our topic of interest, let’s talk about actual physical containers. Containers is what we used to store the shipment of packages. Packages can be anything from small parts to big ones that needed to be shipped from one place to another. Why we use it? We can categorize the packages depending on sizes, color etc.

item.title: ABOUT
item.description: I am Engineering graduate from MIT, Aurangabad. I am RHCSA, RHCE, Rancher Certified Operator: Level One. I like to play around new opensource projects. I had training of Docker, container orchasrtation tool like Kubernetes. I have also learned automation tool like Ansible. To follow my interest, I also going to take exam on RedHat Certified Specialist in Security: Linux. Currently, I am pursuing Red Hat Certified Specialist in Ceph Storage Administration.
